name: TheAtlantic
text: Vladimir Putin's own version of his origins leaves far too much out. A new book tells the true story of how KGB methods, tactics, and operations have fueled Russia’s quest for glory, @anneapplebaum writes. https://t.co/9WEIUykrKW

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Many of us are now riddled with anxiety over whether we’ll send our kids back to school, even part-time, or keep them home," @russell_nm writes: https://t.co/kp5Fm0LxqH

name: TheAtlantic
text: Walt Disney World has reopened and @gcaw spent a weekend riding rides, waving at princesses, and contemplating his mortality. https://t.co/vxbVHmLeTr

name: TheAtlantic
text: Being married seems to make the pandemic more bearable. But the coronavirus could make getting married even harder for millions of Americans, @EmilyBobrow writes: https://t.co/yvGd7iZFMu

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The modern rise of American craft brewing has been a genuine success story of entrepreneurship, localism, constructive business creativity, and in many places, of civic renewal." @JamesFallows on how craft brewing will survive the pandemic: https://t.co/4B6YUOwKoP

name: TheAtlantic
text: The latest episode of the Social Distance podcast features our staff writer, Graeme Wood, making his first visit to Walt Disney World in the midst of the pandemic: https://t.co/TSv19FJe6g
